title: I cant enter a game
body: It just brings me to the loading screen everytime then tells me to check internet connection but my internet connection is fine...the game has started 10 minutes ago

replies.body: When you complete champion select, you then proceed to connecting to your individiual game server.  Your network might be having issues establishing that connection and resulting in errors like that or even a black screen.  I suggest going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to fix this up.  I also recommend testing it out in custom games to not incur any penalties.  This should help!
Okay, can you add a ping test in the client in the future this will help alot cause after some updates the game has high ping and sometimes it doesnt and thanks
